statements: SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, date_created FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT comment FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 102 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC, date_created ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, comment FROM feedback WHERE date_created > '2021-01-01' AND rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback_table ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM review_table WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT review_date, review_text FROM review_table ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT review_id, review_text, customer_id FROM review_table WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE rating <= 2 AND customer_id = 200 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM services_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_text FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_id, review_text FROM services_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT decision_text, decision_date FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM services_reviews WHERE service_id = 502 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM services_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.5 AND rating < 5.0 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Review ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT decision_name, decision_description, decision_date FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' AND rating > 3.0;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_category FROM TravelServices WHERE service_category = 'Hotel' OR service_category = 'Flight' ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT customer_id, rating, created_at FROM ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT rating, created_at FROM ratings WHERE product_id = 3 AND customer_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
